result.eng: Do you mean to carry on?
result.ga: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.orig: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.html: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidhDo you mean to carry on?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aġaiḋDo you mean to carry on?

result.eng: The abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ga: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadhThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ponchtml: Lean an saiġdiúir tréigṫe ag troid go dtí an deireaḋThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.html: Lean an bóthar sinFollow that road.
result.ponchtml: Lean an bóṫar sinFollow that road.

result.html: Lean an carr sinFollow that car!
result.ponchtml: Lean an carr sinFollow that car!

result.eng: Keep going to the crossroads and turn left.
result.ga: Lean ar aghaidh go dtí an crosbhóthar agus tiontaigh ar chlé
result.orig: Lean ar aghaidh go dtí an crosbhóthar agus tiontaigh ar chlé
result.html: Lean ar aghaidh go dtí an crosbhóthar agus tiontaigh ar chléKeep going to the crossroads and turn left.
result.ponchtml: Lean ar aġaiḋ go dtí an crosḃóṫar agus tiontaiġ ar ċléKeep going to the crossroads and turn left.

result.html: Lean ortKeep going!
result.ponchtml: Lean ortKeep going!

result.html: Lean siad abhaile méThey followed me home.
result.ponchtml: Lean siad aḃaile méThey followed me home.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.html: Leanaigí oraibhKeep going!
result.ponchtml: Leanaigí oraiḃKeep going!

result.eng: The course will be continued in the next semester.
result.ga: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eile
result.orig: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eile
result.html: Leanfar den chúrsa sa chéad seimeastar eileThe course will be continued in the next semester.
result.ponchtml: Leanfar den ċúrsa sa ċéad seimeastar eileThe course will be continued in the next semester.

result.eng: If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ga: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.orig: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.html: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ponchtml: Má leanann tú ar aġaiḋ mar sin beiḋ tú marḃ faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.

result.ga: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireacht
result.orig: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireacht
result.html: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireachtThey continued spying.
result.ponchtml: Lean siad ar aġaiḋ ag spiaireaċtThey continued spying.

result.eng: Follow me. Do as I do.
result.html: Lean domhsaFollow me. Do as I do.
result.ponchtml: Lean doṁsaFollow me. Do as I do.
